item.title: Data Visualization using GGPLOT2
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from [@jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme](https://github.com/jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme) and modified by Yihui Xie.
